00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_DATA_SOURCE_H_

00033 #include "mimas/constants.h"

00035 using namespace lubyk;
00036 
00037 #include <QtCore/QAbstractItemModel>
00038 #include <QtGui/QMouseEvent>
00039 #include <QtCore/QPoint>
00040 
00041 #include <iostream>
00042 
00043 
00044 namespace mimas {
00045 
00052 class DataSource : public QAbstractItemModel, public ThreadedLuaObject
00053 {
00054   Q_OBJECT
00055 
00056 public:
00057   DataSource() {
00058     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00059   }
00060 
00061   ~DataSource() {
00062     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00063   }
00064 
00065   void reset() {
00066     // reload all data
00067     // ??? Does not work
00068     QAbstractItemModel::reset();
00069   }
00070 
00071   void emitLayoutChanged() {
00072     emit(layoutChanged());
00073   }
00074 
00075   //  index(), parent(), rowCount(), columnCount(), and data()
00076   virtual QModelIndex index(int row, int column, const QModelIndex &parent = QModelIndex()) const {
00077     // ignore parent (hierarchical views) for now
00078     return createIndex(row, column);
00079   }
00080 protected:
00081   virtual QModelIndex parent(const QModelIndex &child) const {
00082     return QModelIndex(); // no parent
00083   }
00084 
00085   virtual int rowCount(const QModelIndex &parent = QModelIndex()) const {
00086     lua_State *L = lua_;
00087 
00088     if (!pushLuaCallback("rowCount")) {
00089       return 0;
00090     }
00091     // <func> <self>
00092     int status = lua_pcall(L, 1, 1, 0);
00093 
00094     if (status) {
00095       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'rowCount' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00096       return 0;
00097     }
00098 
00099     int count = lua_tonumber(L, -1);
00100     lua_pop(L, 1);
00101     return count < 0 ? 0 : count;
00102   }
00103 
00104   virtual int columnCount(const QModelIndex &parent = QModelIndex()) const {
00105     lua_State *L = lua_;
00106 
00107     if (!pushLuaCallback("columnCount")) return 0;
00108     // <func> <self>
00109     int status = lua_pcall(L, 1, 1, 0);
00110 
00111     if (status) {
00112       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'columnCount' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00113       return 0;
00114     }
00115 
00116     int count = lua_tonumber(L, -1);
00117     lua_pop(L, 1);
00118     return count < 0 ? 0 : count;
00119   }
00120 
00121   virtual QVariant data(const QModelIndex &index, int role = Qt::DisplayRole) const {
00122     if (role != Qt::DisplayRole) return QVariant();
00123     lua_State *L = lua_;
00124 
00125     if (!pushLuaCallback("data")) return QVariant();
00126     lua_pushnumber(L, index.row() + 1);
00127     lua_pushnumber(L, index.column() + 1);
00128     // <func> <self> <row> <column>
00129     int status = lua_pcall(L, 3, 1, 0);
00130 
00131     if (status) {
00132       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'data' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00133       return QVariant();
00134     }
00135     QVariant res = variantFromLua(L, -1);
00136     lua_pop(L, 1);
00137     return res;
00138   }
00139 
00140   virtual QVariant headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, int role = Qt::DisplayRole) const {
00141     if (role != Qt::DisplayRole) return QVariant();
00142     lua_State *L = lua_;
00143 
00144     if (!pushLuaCallback("header")) return QVariant();
00145     lua_pushnumber(L, section + 1);
00146     lua_pushnumber(L, orientation);
00147     // <func> <self> <section> <orientation>
00148     int status = lua_pcall(L, 3, 1, 0);
00149 
00150     if (status) {
00151       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'header' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00152       return QVariant();
00153     }
00154     QVariant res = variantFromLua(L, -1);
00155     lua_pop(L, 1);
00156     return res;
00157   }
00158 };
